allow: Bash(python -c "from app.config import settings; print(f''SECRET_KEY: {settings.SECRET_KEY}''); print(f''ALGORITHM: {settings.ALGORITHM}'')")
Bash(python -c "from passlib.context import CryptContext; pwd_context = CryptContext(schemes=[''bcrypt''], deprecated=''auto''); print(''Hash para admin123:'', pwd_context.hash(''admin123''))")
